required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Pharmacodynamic Effects of a Single Oral Dose of GS-0976 (NDI-010976) in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study To Evaluate the Pharmacodynamic Effects of A Single Oral Dose of NDI-010976 in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the pharmacodynamic (PD) effects of GS-0976 (NDI-010976) on fractional de novo lipogenesis (DNL) following a single oral dose administration in overweight and/or obese, but otherwise healthy, male adults.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in fractional DNL (% new palmitate)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Change in DNL over time following administration of GS-0976 and placebo
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline over time in adiponectin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline over time in adiponectin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline over time in leptin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline over time in leptin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline over time in blood ketones
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline over time in blood ketones
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline over time in lipid profile
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline over time in lipid profile
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number and severity of treatment-emergent adverse events (TEAEs) following single oral doses of GS-0976 and placebo
Percentage of participants experiencing abnormal clinical laboratory tests
Pharmacokinetics (PK) of GS-0976 and its metabolite: tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax is defined as the time (observed time point) of Cmax.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK of GS-0976 and its metabolite: Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the maximum concentration of drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK of GS-0976 and its metabolite: AUC_0-t
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 10 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: AUC_0-t is defined as the concentration of drug over time from time zero to time "t".

clinical_study.condition: PD Effects of GS-0976 (NDI-010976) on Fractional DNL

arm_group.description: Sequence 1: Period 1 (2 days): 50 mg (1 x 50 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution Sequence 2: Period 1 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): 50 mg (1 x 50 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution

Sequence 3: Period 1 (2 days): 200 mg (1 x 200 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution Sequence 4: Period 1 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): 200 mg (1 x 200 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution

Sequence 5: Period 1 (2 days): 20 mg (2 X 10 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution Sequence 6: Period 1 (2 days): placebo + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution; Washout Period (minimum of 5 days); Period 2 (2 days): 20 mg (2 X 10 mg capsule) + IV infusion 1-13C acetate and fructose solution

intervention.description: 10 g ± 0.25 g in 1000 mL 0.45% saline solution administered intravenously for 19 hours
Fructose solution administered orally under fasted conditions immediately after study drug and every 30 minutes for a total of 20 doses

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overweight and/or obese, but otherwise healthy males
- Weight ≥ 50.0 kg
- Body Mass Index (BMI): 25.0 - 32.0 kg/m^2, inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Intolerance to or malabsorption of fructose
- A history of clinically significant gastrointestinal disease and/or surgery, which would result in the subject's inability to absorb or metabolize the study drug (e.g., gastrectomy, gastric bypass, cholecystectomy).
- In the opinion of the Investigator, a history of clinically significant hematologic, renal, hepatic, bronchopulmonary, neurological, psychiatric, metabolic , endocrine disorder (e.g., diabetes, thyroid disease), or cardiovascular disease.
